movies.title: Denial
movies.plot: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 nominations.

events.title: Deborah Lipstadt finds out that David Irving is suing her publisher, Penguin Books
the judge rules on the Irving v Penguin Books Ltd libel case

movies.title: The Soloist
movies.plot: A Los Angeles journalist befriends a homeless Juilliard-trained musician, while looking for a new article for the paper.
